description:
Inspiration taken from 
https://technicalramblings.com/blog/setting-grafana-influxdb-telegraf-ups-monitoring-unraid/

Updating https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/7197 to work with Telegraf apcupsd integration for simpler/easier automation of retrieving APC information

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") *0.22/1000 FROM "power" WHERE "host" = 'mainpower' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "power" WHERE "host" = 'mainpower' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") *0.22/1000 FROM "power" WHERE "host" = 'mainpower' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "power" WHERE "host" = 'mainpower' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "power" WHERE "host" = 'mainpower' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)

reduceOptions.fields: /^\{__name__="tripplite_current_charge_pct", instance="10\.10\.0\.249:9528", job="tripplite", path="0004:0002:00", product="Tripp Lite UPS "\}$/

targets.query: SELECT sum("load_percent") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "load_percent" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
